concept.description: Labels functional interfaces (i.e. to be used as lambda expressions) with "FunctionalInterface".
concept.cypher: MATCH (functionalInterface:Interface)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(functionalInterfaceType) WHERE functionalInterfaceType.fqn = 'java.lang.FunctionalInterface' SET functionalInterface:FunctionalInterface RETURN count(functionalInterface) AS FunctionalInterfaces

concept.description: Labels default methods of interfaces with "Default".
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:Interface)-[:DECLARES]->(defaultMethod:Method) WHERE NOT has(defaultMethod.abstract) SET defaultMethod:Default RETURN count(defaultMethod) AS DefaultMethods
